meanings.definition: To surpass in intrigue or interest.
meanings.sent1: The new movie outintrigued the old one.
meanings.sent2: Her story was so outintriguing that everyone wanted to hear more.
meanings.sent3: The detective outintrigued everyone with his unexpected solution to the case.
meanings.sent4: The magician's tricks outintrigued the audience, leaving them in awe.
meanings.sent5: The treasure map was outintriguing, leading the adventurers on an exciting journey.

meanings.definition: To be more intriguing than something else.
meanings.sent1: The mystery novel outintrigued the romance novel.
meanings.sent2: His theory was outintriguing compared to the others.
meanings.sent3: The cat's antics outintrigued the dog, making it curious.
meanings.sent4: The conspiracy theory outintrigued all other explanations.
meanings.sent5: The new exhibit at the museum was outintriguing, drawing a large crowd.
